attributes.action: Sanction Hungary for breaching the Human rights of Refugees.
attributes.additional_details:
Article 5
Right to liberty and security.
attributes.background: Hungary has held refugees in sub human conditions, refusing them legal representation or counsel in their own language, further to this they (the refugees) are being given fraudulent documentation. This is in breach and a direct defiance of article 5/ human rights act as amended 1998.
